Translations.Text: Non habet any doubt regarding quod these people worship they worship exactly prout they invenit their parentes worshipping Nos requite them their due share fully reduction
Nos dedit Moses scripture it disputed ac it est pro predetermined word decretum tuus Dominus they scabinus statim! They est foderator de doubt de hoc suspicious
Tuus Dominus surely recompense everyone their works He est fully Cognizant de everything they perfecit
Ergo continue path vos enjoined subsequentis unus those repented vos non transgress! He est Seer de everything vos perfecit
Non lean towards those transgressed lest vos incur Hell invenit nullus allies help vos DEUS tunc finis losers
Vos observe Contact Prayers (Salat) ambo finis de feria nox. righteous works wipe malus works Hoc est reminder those take heed
Vos steadfastly persevere DEUS nunquam fails recompense the righteous

Si unus some de those among proximus generations possessed satis intelligence forbid malus! Unus ut few de them deserved saved nos! Prout pro transgressors they preoccupied their material luxuries; they est guilty
Tuus Dominus nunquam annihilates any community unjustly dum its people est righteous
